thumb.title: ALL AUTHORITY AND POWER BELONG TO JESUS CHRIST
thumb.description: Rv 12:1010 Then I heard a strong (loud) voice in heaven, saying, Now it has come — the salvation and the power and the kingdom (the dominion, the reign) of our God, and the power (the sovereignty, the authority) of His Christ (the Messiah); for the accuser of our brethren, he who keeps bringing bef
